EmailTemplate.description: End user Certification for customer on the Denied Party list
EmailTemplate.name: All services - Export Compliance Certification
EmailTemplate.subject: Export Compliance Certification {!Account.Name} {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Case_Ref_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Honeywell Export Compliance requires that our customers fill out the attached statement of certification before providing access to our Navigational Database.
We will not be able to grant the access to the tool until this from is filled out and approved by a export compliance officer.
If you have you require any additional assistance please reply to this email.
Regards,
{!Case.OwnerFirstName} Data Services Account Management Representative(AMR) email: dsa@honeywell.com 602-436-6739
For 24-Hour/7-Day technical support, please contact ATS (Aerospace Technical Support) at 855-808-6500 for within the United States and 602-365-6500 for outside the United States,Fax 1-602-365-3343, or email AeroTechSupport@honeywell.com
